articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: NIX.CZ brzy spustí nový přípojný bod v německém Frankfurtu, který se tak po Praze, Bratislavě a Vídni stane dalším místem s možností přístupu k českému propojovacímu uzlu. Byla také dokončena přestavba topologie.
articles.title: NIX.CZ spustí přípojný bod ve Frankfurtu, páteřní síť už má 800 Gbps

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si představíme platformu pro rezervaci a řízení datových toků zákazníků, ukážeme si nového správce stahování, vyzkoušíme si práci s více službami z jedné aplikace a nahrajeme si zvukový obsah.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (6. 12. 2023): sledujte kvalitu připojení svých zákazníků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Zdeněk Böhm)
articles.description: V pracovním procesu vývojáře se občas vyskytne práce, která je poměrně důležitá, ale navenek není vidět. Tím je například aktualizace kódu. Aktualizace vzniká v případě, kdy máte aplikaci, která se skládá z mnoha různých modulů.
articles.title: Aktualizace webových aplikací složených z mnoha různých modulů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Knihovna Scikit-learn kromě modelů (a jejich tréninku) poskytuje i další nástroje. Jedním z užitečných nástrojů, které zde nalezneme, je podpora pro provádění takzvané shlukové analýzy (cluster analysis, clustering).
articles.title: Shluková analýza (clustering) a knihovna Scikit-learn

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů se podíváme na novinky okolo úniku dat ze systémů společnosti Okta, nové zranitelnosti v Bluetooth a v UEFI, nebo útoky na průmyslové systémy vyrobené v Izraeli…
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: útoky na Bluetooth, PLC i UEFI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 10 definitivně opustí X.Org a přejde na Wayland. Firma Xiaomi uvolnila svou IoT platformu Vela pod svobodnou licencí. Vyšlo FreeBSD 14.0, nové velké vydání tohoto svobodného operačního systému.
articles.title: RHEL 10 se už obejde bez X.Org, Xiaomi Vela je open-source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ovladač Wine Wayland již použitelný, Miriway pro běh Xfce/MATE/LXQt Waylandu, vylepšení stability a renderingu i AMD FSR 2.2 v Godot 4.2, Mesa 23.3 s NVK, AMD RDNA3 Refresh i Raspberry Pi 5, vydána Plasma 6.0 Beta 1.
articles.title: Xfce, MATE či LXQt na Waylandu díky Miru, Mesa 23.3 nejen pro Raspberry Pi 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vestavěný textový editor notepad ve Windows 11 bude umět počítat znaky. Je potřeba verzi 11.2311.29.0, která vyšla včera pro Microsoft Insiders (Preview Build 26010).
articles.title: Notepad ve Windows 11 bude umět počítat znaky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Vyšla nová verze operačního systému Raspberry Pi OS pro jednodeskové počítače Raspberry Pi s označením 2023–12–05. Mezi novinky patří tmavý vzhled, jádro je 6.1.63 místo 6.1.0 v předchozí verzi a Firefox i Chromium byly aktualizovány na verzi 119.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi OS 2023-12-05 s tmavým vzhledem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Výzkumníci z Binarly.io objevili několik zranitelností UEFI, které souhrnně označují jako LogoFAIL. Jde o nahrazení bootovacího loga výrobce speciálně upraveným obrázkem, který může být na pohled identický s originálem, ale který dokáže spustit libovolný kód ve fázi DXE (Driver Execution Environment). Protože je útok již v DXE fázi, je běžná obrana pomocí  Secure Boot, Intel Boot Guard nebo ARM TrustZone bezmocná. Pak si útočník může prakticky dělat cokoliv. Například zapsat soubor na disk, který potom bude spuštěn OS.
articles.title: Kritická zranitelnost UEFI LogoFAIL

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Hashicorp Vault je nastroj na správu hesel, klíčů a citlivých dat. Vault zároveň umožňuje nastavovat jednorázové přístupy s krátkou platností pro ještě lepší zabezpečení. Vše běží bezpečně v HA. Jste vývojáři či devopsáci, kteří chtějí bezpečně ukládat tajemství? Přihlaste se na naše školení Hashicorp Vault.
articles.title: Hashicorp Vault: nastroj na správu hesel, klíčů a citlivých dat (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Sdružení CZ.NIC a bezpečnostní tým CSIRT.CZ vyzývají k účasti na největším evropském kybernetickém cvičení Cyber Europe 2024, které se bude konat v červnu příštího roku.
articles.title: Výzva k účasti na kybercvičení Cyber Europe 2024

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Věc, o které i zde na Rootu štěbetáme s vrabci už nějakou dobu, je zpečetěna. Některé ovladače pro velmi staré grafické karty už nebudou v Linuxu 6.8 podporovány. Do vývojové větve DRM-Next už zamířily patche, které se o to postarají.
articles.title: Potvrzeno: Linux 6.8 už bez podpory velmi starých grafických karet

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po půl roce od předchozího vydání byla uvolněna nová pravidelná verze linuxové distribuce Alpine Linux, tentokrát s označením 3.19.0. Hlavní novinkou je přidání podpory pro jednodeskový počítač Raspberry Pi 5, zároveň byla dřívější jádra linux-rpi4 a linux-rpi2 nahrazena jedním společným  linux-rpi.
articles.title: Alpine Linux 3.19.0 přidává podporu pro Raspberry Pi 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vánoční dárek od tvůrců systemd je nová verze, která mimo jiné přináší na Linuxu obdobu slavné „modré obrazovky smrti“ (Blue Screen of Death, zkráceně BSoD) v podobě komponenty systemd-bsod. V případě použití je schopna uživateli zobrazovat logované chybové hlášky při startu systému, pokud dojde k selhání. Na obrazovce se pak objeví i QR kód pro získání podrobnějších informací k chybě.
articles.title: Nová verze systemd 255 přináší „Blue Screen of Death“ na Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: svatas)
articles.description: Známý dvou panelový správce souborů Altap Salamander pro Microsoft Windows změnil své jméno na Open Salamander a jeho zdrojový kód je nyní k dispozici pod licencí GNU GPL v2. Repozitář je k dispozici na serveru GitHub.
articles.title: Open Salamander 5.0: Altap Salamander přelicencován pod GNU GPL

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Slušelo by se začít hláškou „a počet dál roste“. Projekt LVFS sloužící na Linuxu ve spojení s nástrojem fwupd pro aktualizace firmwarů stále rostoucího počtu zařízení má za sebou další milník, lidem jej využívajícím už doručil více než 0,1 miliardy takových aktualizací.
articles.title: LVFS doručil uživatelům už víc než 100 miliónů aktualizací firmwarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Podle vládní směrnice mají vývojáři webových stránek pro americkou vládu a vládní organizace podporovat pouze prohlížeče s více než 2% podílem na trhu. Jelikož podíl Firefoxu se již blíží k téhle hranici, je možné očekávat postupný úpadek kdysi slavného prohlížeče.
articles.title: Firefox zřejmě ztratí podporu na amerických vládních webech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: anonymní)
articles.description: Ve středu 13. prosince se v Praze uskuteční další OWASP Czech chapter meeting v kancelářích společenosti Ataccama Software. Svým návštěvníkům nabídne přísun zajímavostí z oblasti IT bezpečnosti ve formě dvou podvečerních přednášek, na které je registrace zcela zdarma.
articles.title: Pozvánka na OWASP Czech chapter meeting ve středu 13. prosince

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Fedora s verzí 40 podle všeho vstoupí do další fáze prací na podpoře unified kernel images (UKI). Čtyřicítka by měla přinést podporu bootování těchto obrazu, bez nutnosti projít klasickou cestou skrze GRUB či SD-Boot.
articles.title: Fedora 40 vyhlíží po přímém bootování s Unified Kernel Images

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na světě je stodvacáté vydání Chrome, resp. Chromium. Jednou z novinek je implementace API CloseWatcher pro lepší přímou podporu požadavků typu stisknuté klávesy Esc či gesta „zpět“ či elementu .
articles.title: Chrome 120 přináší API CloseWatcher

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: IBM a Meta s padesátkou dalších významných subjektů zakládají novou alianci pro umělou inteligenci. Mezi členy AI Alliance najdeme:
articles.title: Založena celosvětová AI Alliance, členy jsou prakticky všichni kromě Googlu, Microsoftu a OpenAI

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Google opravila vzdáleně zneužitelnou kritickou zranitelnost typu zero-click (CVE-2023–40088) a distribuuje ji společně s dalšími 85 problémy ve vydání bezpečnostních aktualizací systému Android pro prosinec 2023.
articles.title: Android v prosincovém vydání opravuje vzdáleně zneužitelnou chybu typu zero-click

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost IBM oznámila, že vyrobila dva kvantové systémy, jejichž uvedení na trh plánovala na rok 2023. Jeden z nich je založen na čipu s názvem Condor, který je největším dosud vydaným kvantovým procesorem založeným na transmonech, s 1 121 funkčními qubity.
articles.title: IBM vydává více než 1000qubitový procesor a plán na opravu chyb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vyšla verze 5.0 webového frameworku Django napsaného v Pythonu. Toto vydání podporuje Python 3.10, 3.11 a 3.12 a vývojáři důrazně doporučují používat právě tyto verze. Předchozí série Django 4.2.x byla poslední, která podporovala Python 3.8 a 3.9.
articles.title: Vyšlo Django 5.0

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Služba Have I Been Pwned (HIBP) je tu s námi už deset let a Troy Hunt na svém blogu zavzpomínal, jak původně malý osobní projekt velmi rychle vyrostl. Přesně před deseti lety jsem zveřejnil tweet, kterým jsem spustil něco, co se mělo stát jen dalším domácím projektem, který poškrábe svrbění, bude užitečný pro pár lidí, ale jinak brzy upadne do stejného zapomnění jako všechny ostatní, které jsem spustil v předchozích letech.
articles.title: Hlídač uniklých hesel Have I Been Pwned slaví desetileté výročí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Výzkumníci z Google DeepMind a několika dalších univerzit objevili trik, jak donutit ChatGPT aby vyzradil text, na kterém byl trénován. Trik spočívá v zadání: opakuj do nekonečna nějaké slovo. Ze začátku ChatGPT slovo opakuje, ale po překročení nějakého limitu začne vracet text, na kterém byl trénován.
articles.title: ChatGPT vyzradí text, na kterém byl trénován

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Gmail používá ke klasifikaci spamu strojové učení v TensorFlow s názvem RETVec (Resilient & Efficient Text Vectorizer). Spameři totiž v poslední době používají například záměnu znaků, které vypadají stejně nebo podobně, ale mají jiný kód a běžné statistické metody je tedy ne vždy zachytí.
articles.title: Gmail používá proti spamu RETVec

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Začiatkom decembra sa začal nový ročník Advent of Cyber. Ide o zábavnú hru a vedomostnú súťaž v jednom. Každý deň od 1. do 24. decembra sa zverejní nová séria úloh z vybranej oblasti počítačovej bezpečnosti. Úlohy sú relatívne jednoduché a účastníci nájdu riešenia priamo v zadaniach. Neskôr sa riešenia preberú v podrobných video tutoriáloch. Advent of Cyber je určený pre všetkých začiatočníkov, ktorý sa zaujímajú o kybernetickú bezpečnosť.
articles.title: Advent of Cyber 2023

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Po asi šesti letech vývoje vyšla 25. listopadu ostrá verze strategické hry Retro Commander. Připomíná klasiku RTS například C&C, ale odehrává se v postapokalyptické budoucnosti. Máte na výběr velmi mnoho jednotek. Jsou tu například vzducholodě, letadla, teleporty, ponorky, letadlové lodě a rakety s jadernou hlavicí.
articles.title: Pěkná strategická hra Retro Commander

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Oblíbený open source textový editor Notepad++ slaví 20 let. K této příležitosti vyšel ve verzi 8.6. Mezi novinky patří multi edit a možnost zapamatovat si nepřístupné soubory od posledního spuštění.
articles.title: Notepad++ slaví 20 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Heřmánek)
articles.description: Poznejte, jak ve Wazuh funguje detekce hrozeb a nastavení aktivní ochrany před hrozbami a zranitelnostmi. Ve středu 6. prosince od 10:00 do 12:00 vám na bezplatném webináři celý koncept i proces základního nastavení představí zkušený lektor Miroslav Chládek.
articles.title: Wazuh: Detekce hrozeb a aktivní ochrana

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled listopadových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za listopad 2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Co se dnes v tiskařině vyplatí? Polovodičový trh dosáhne letos svého dna, očekává se další etapa růstu. Více než polovina firem není připravena využít AI. Salesforce v Praze představil, jak CRM a AI pomáhají při obsluze zákazníků. Dell Technologies Forum 2023 se zabývalo umělou inteligencí. Konference Fortinet Security Day se zaměřila na budoucnost kybernetické bezpečnosti. Organizace nejsou připraveny na energetické nároky a datové požadavky umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Organizace nejsou připraveny na energetické nároky a datové požadavky umělé inteligence

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Detekovali a popsali druhou nejenergetičtější částici kosmického záření v historii. Nečekané vlastnosti materiálu ze skla a DNA. Jádro zlata podivně mění tvar z kulatého na šišatý. Temná hmota, MOND a planeta číslo 9. Zranitelné technologie budou na Zemi chráněny před kosmickým zářením.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Boltzmannovy mozky a rozkoše solipsismu

articles.description: Ať už sháníte levný způsob jak postavit nový počítač, nebo jen chcete pořídit upgrade vaší stárnoucí kopie Office, tato kolekce nabídky na Goodoffer24.com vám pomůže na nohy a můžete zase prakticky okamžitě pracovat – a bez vyluxování bankovního konta. Ceny které tam nabízejí, jsou opravdu úžasně nízké, tak na co čekáte?
articles.title: Nezmeškejte úžasné 90% slevy na doživotní licence Microsoft Windows 10/11

articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 47/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vyšlo podzimní OpenBSD. Aktualizovány byly linuxové distribuce MX Linux, Tails či TrueNAS SCALE a také desktopové NomadBSD a GhostBSD, obě založené na FreeBSD. Organizace OpenELA zveřejnila zdrojové balíčky pro alternativní sestavení Red Hat Enterprise Linuxu.

After winning big last night at The Game Awards and bagging trophies in three major categories, Remedy Entertainment has just announced "The Final Draft" for Alan Wake 2; a major update that not only introduces the New Game Plus mode we've been waiting on, but also unlocks an additional ending to the main story.


With all the intricate plot threads and surrealist narrative developments in Alan Wake 2, a few more playthroughs are definitely in order to wrap your head around Sam Lake's acclaimed sequel. And why start from scratch when you can retain all your equipment and instead contend with more challenging mobs?


The studio is teasing numerous "subtle additions" in the New Game Plus experience, including a Nightmare Difficulty setting and even new manuscript pages and videos. There are also bug fixes and performance optimizations, which might help the demanding game run more smoothly on older PC hardware.  The Final Draft is scheduled to go live on December 11.


via Remedy Entertainment


How to unlock the New Game Plus mode in Alan Wake 2


It goes without saying that a completed playthrough of the game is required to unlock the New Game Plus, but it looks like the new additions in The Final Draft will also require you to finish the game at least once.


You retain all your Charms and character upgrades, but the weapons will be found in the character's first available shoebox, as opposed to their inventory.


It's unclear if the new ending can be unlocked during your first playthrough, though with two more expansion packs (Night Springs and The Lake House) coming our way in 2024 and beyond, this probably won't serve as the definitive conclusion to the stories of our main protagonists.

articles.description:
It's been a long night of The Game Awards. Many trailers have been shown for upcoming games, but only one can be the final trailer. Capcom has taken that honor this year by revealing the newest installment in the Monster Hunter series, Monster Hunter Wilds.


As has been a recurring theme during this event, we didn't exactly see a ton of raw gameplay in this trailer. We do, however, see a lot of monsters. Also, some sick mount acrobatics are shown off. And before we know it, a title card is thrown on screen. Clearly this is a teaser just to let us all know this game exists, since that projected date of 2025 is still a ways off from now. Feel free to speculate based on the footage we were shown.




After the trailer, Geoff Keighley brought Monster Hunter series producer Ryozo Tsujimoto to the stage. Despite acknowledging that the game is dated for 2025, Keighley asked Tsujimoto when we might expect to play Monster Hunter Wilds. As one might expect, the answer for when we'll play this video game coming out in 2025 is "2025." However, Tsujimoto clarified that we should expect to learn more about the title during the Summer of 2024.


Monster Hunter Wilds will release on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam. This is notable, as the game's predecessor, Monster Hunter Rise, was originally a Nintendo Switch title. The platforms shown indicate that Wilds will be closer in spirit to Monster Hunter World, which will be roughly seven years old by the time Wilds comes out. 


I'm interested to see if games like Monster Hunter Rise on the Switch and Monster Hunter Now on mobile devices drives winds up attracting new audiences to Monster Hunter Wilds once it releases. It's certainly made me pay more attention to the series, so we'll have to see if this strategy pays off when Monster Hunter Wilds debuts two years from now.

There's also a musical treat in the form of "the 'Away (1987)' Orchestrion Roll which allows a chip-tune version of the song 'Away' to be played as background music in the hideaway."

Open Betas of The Finals has been enough to turn this FPS into a very anticipated multiplayer game. As one of the biggest surprises of The Game Awards, Embark surprise launched the game on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S. 


Though we've gotten a sample of it prior, we'll finally be able to see everything the adrenaline-filled shooter has to offer. With the launch of Season 1, you'll get to play in the Las Vegas virtual arena that'll leave you dazzled with its lights and even some unexpected features such as UFOs. 


As Embark has explained, at its core, The Finals is a game show featuring arenas inspired by real-world locations. You're given the freedom to create your own hero and vie for victory. It doesn't hold back when it comes to mayhem-filled fun, and you can show off your skills in environments reactive enough for furniture to be destroyed and buildings to collapse. 


Image via Embark. 


The hype behind The Finals


The game's unique premise and gorgeous visuals attracted over 7.5 million players during its Open Beta. Though it was praised by critics and players alike, some technical issues slightly dampened the experience. Embark has acknowledged these hiccups and has paid attention to community requests when tweaking the final release. 




If you're new to The Finals, be prepared for something quite novel. As creative director Gustav Tilleby explains, "The Finals isn’t another battle royale, military sim, or tactical FPS – there are plenty of those out there. It’s an entirely new take on shooters." It's hard to argue against this, as while we've had FPS games with destructible environments before (looking at you BattleBit Remastered), the studio's doing it on a scale that few others would attempt. 


Embark is a relatively young studio, having been founded in 2019. If pulled off correctly, The Finals could be the title that puts the Swedish team on the map.

articles.title: The Finals receives a surprise launch at The Game Awards

For the tenth anniversary since the announcement of No Man’s Sky, Hello Games has revealed their next game, Light No Fire. As is tradition at The Game Awards, it also came with a trailer.


Light No Fire is aiming to be a survival sandbox game set in a massive, procedurally generated open world claimed to be comparative in size to Earth. That’s the planet we live on!




The trailer shows off multiplayer, construction, and all kinds of traversal types on birds and dragons. The order of the day seems to be scale, but there are some cool scenes, like rabbit people bowing for some reason.


Scale is nice, but I’d like to see more about how it will differentiate itself from other survival sandbox games. Particularly No Man’s Sky. It’s a pretty full genre right now, and “big map” isn’t really the selling point it used to be. However, Hello Games has learned a lot from the constant development of No Man’s Sky.


Light No Fire has no announced release window, and the only announced platform right now is PC.

articles.title: Hello Games unveils massive open-world multiplayer game, Light No Fire

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
Need a new co-op heist game to fill the void that Payday 3 may or may not have left in your heart? Developer 10 Chambers may have your back, as their latest project Den of Wolves was unveiled during The Game Awards 2023.


I'm gonna be upfront, I don't know what to say about this trailer. It doesn't really show heist gameplay, so... I'm just going to take 10 Chambers' word that that's the genre of the game. They certainly talk about heists, that's for sure. Something interesting does seem to be going on, and it does apparently involve blowing up a safe. The creator of Payday: The Heist, Payday 2, and GTFO is behind this, so, yeah, that checks out. If you'd like to make more sense of this footage than me, than by all means.




This reveal came on the heels of the Final Chapter update for GTFO. Those who are interested in that title can try it out for free on December 10.


Meanwhile, no release date for Den of Wolves has been shown at this time. However, if you're interested in learning more about this sci-fi co-op heist shooter, you can follow the game on Steam.

The post Den of Wolves is a new heist game from the creator of Payday and GTFO appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Den of Wolves is a new heist game from the creator of Payday and GTFO

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
After more delays than I can even remember, Skull and Bones is finally releasing. Ubisoft revealed the multiplayer pirate simulator is now scheduled to release on February 16, 2024. Ubisoft+ subscribers will get access to the game three days early on February 13. For those keeping track, Skull and Bones was originally revealed back in 2017 and has been delayed literally every year since then.


For those interested in checking it out, a close beta will commence from December 15 through December 18.


Even though Skull and Bones was originally announced on last-generation platforms, it's now scheduled to release only on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.



The post Skull and Bones will finally release in February (no, seriously) appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Skull and Bones will finally release in February (no, seriously)

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
As part of The Game Awards, Arkane Lyon announced that they have a new game coming up based on Marvel’s Blade.


There isn’t really much information given away in the teaser. The eponymous daywalker has his shave interrupted. He then puts on his coat and gets his sword.




What we do know is that it will be a single-player, third-person game where you can “play Blade your way.” It also takes place in Paris. That’s about it.


Marvel’s Blade has no announced release window or target platforms.

The post Arkane Lyon announces a new Blade game appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Arkane Lyon announces a new Blade game

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
Every once in a while, we get to see a pretty original game take the stage at The Game Awards 2023. And Tales of Kenzera: ZAU certainly seems like it's taking a fresh look at its genre inspirations, bringing something new to action-platforming next April.


Tales of Kenzera: ZAU is from Surgent Studios, under the EA Originals label, working in collaboration with Critical Role. It's a huge list of big names, but the idea itself is really compelling. ZAU is a gorgeous action-platformer with some 'Vania inspiration.




Per a GameSpot interview with the studio, ZAU is story inside a story, as a son lost in grief for his dead father reads a tale about Zau. Zau makes a bargain with the god of death to bring his father back from the dead.


Seems ready to bring on the emotions, but the action and platform-hopping look good too. We'll see how the next EA Original performs next year, too. Tales of Kenzera: Zau is targeting an April 23, 2024 launch on consoles and PC.

The post Tales of Kenzera: ZAU is an intriguing new Metroidvania arriving in April appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Tales of Kenzera: ZAU is an intriguing new Metroidvania arriving in April

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
Life is Strange is one of those series that always caught my eye. However, after a certain point, I felt overwhelmed by all the games I'd need to play to catch up. Fortunately, the team at Don't Nod has me covered, because they're teeing up a whole new universe in the upcoming Lost Record: Bloom & Rage.


At first glance, it certainly looks like a new Life is Strange game. It shows some teenagers rocking out, running through the woods, and something involving a burning building. You know, typical teenage stuff. However, there's some sort of void, and afterwards, a cut to the future. What, exactly, happened here, and why does our one character at the end look pretty shaken by it? That's for us to presumably find out.




That mystery will hopefully be solved when Lost Record: Bloom & Rage comes out in late 2024. We don't have a lot to work with here, but it has sparked my curiosity at any rate. We'll update this post as we learn more about this adventure.

The post Life is Strange developers unveil a new world in Lost Record: Bloom & Rage appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Life is Strange developers unveil a new world in Lost Record: Bloom & Rage

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
At The Game Awards, Saber Interactive revealed its single-player action-adventure game Jurassic Park: Survival. Players will return to Isla Nublar which is now filled with living dinosaurs as the game takes place the day after the events of the 1993 Jurassic Park film. In Survival, players will explore the island as they outsmart and interact with the dinosaurs to progress through the island.




It's an interesting decision to take with the IP. I have to admit, I thought it would be more similar to ARK: Survival Ascended with the Survival moniker, but I think this could end up being a fun take if it's done well.


Jurassic Park: Survival will launch on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

The post Jurassic Park: Survival is an action-adventure game set after the movies appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Jurassic Park: Survival is an action-adventure game set after the movies

articles.author: Smangaliso Simelane
articles.description:
Black Myth: Wukong has received a new trailer at The Game Awards, and if you aren't sold on it yet, this may be what sways you. 


The trailer shows off impressive visuals, along with some of the enemies you'll be facing. It looks like an adventure and a half with beasts of immense size roaming on the ground, in the sky, and underwater. You of course won't be going into it unarmed, as the trailer gives up glimpses of some of the action-packed sword combat. 


The game is inspired by the 1592 Chinese fantasy novel Journey to the West. Though the game seems worth getting excited about, it is not void of controversy, most of it relating to accusations of sexism at Game Science. 


 IGN reports, "several posts have surfaced from Chinese social media site Weibo, written by individuals from the studio, that contain multiple references to genitalia and sexual innuendos." Furthermore, there have been "recruitment posters by the studio, produced in 2015, which featured images and headlines that point to a culture of ingrained sexism in Game Science."


This has resulted in backlash from the gaming community, but seemingly not enough to stop the game from appearing at The Game Awards. Black Myth: Wukong is coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S.

The post Black Myth: Wukong arrives August 20, 2024 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Black Myth: Wukong arrives August 20, 2024

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
During The Game Awards, developer Neople and publisher Nexon revealed The First Berserker: Khazan, its upcoming hardcore single-player action RPG set in the Dungeon & Fighter (DNF) universe.  In the reveal trailer we get a look at the anime-style story the ARPG will be based on. Khazan will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.




Players are tasked with surviving the relentless pursuit of imperial forces as they navigate numerous conspiracies aimed at killing Khazan as they overcome the harsh environments of the world. Along the way, players will recall their long-lost skills of battle through brutal torture and decimation of Khazan's enemies who stand against him.

The post The First Berserker: Khazan is an action RPG in the DNF universe appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The First Berserker: Khazan is an action RPG in the DNF universe

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Digital Extremes revealed during The Game Awards that the next big update for Warframe, titled Whispers in the Walls will be released next week on December 13. The update focuses on a cinematic quest and narrative arc featuring popular voice actors Neil Newbon (Baldur's Gate 3) and Ben Starr(Final Fantasy XVI). Starr will also be returning for the upcoming Warframe 1999.




I've always been so intrigued with the story of Warframe and it looks like this brings it to the next level. Sounds like it's time for me to get back caught up so I can check it out.


The Warframe update Whispers in the Walls releases on December 13 on all platforms and will include cross-platform saving as well as the 55th Warframe Qorvex.

The post Newest Warframe update Whispers in the Walls releases next week appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Newest Warframe update Whispers in the Walls releases next week

articles.author: Smangaliso Simelane
articles.description:
We'll get to explore Dead by Daylight's world once more through The Casting of Frank Stone, a new title by Behaviour Interactive in partnership with Supermassive Games. 


From the brief glimpse of the game the debut trailer offers, we discover we have a mystery on our hands, and like several titles from Supermassive, your choices will shape the story and outcome. You'll be thrust into Cedar Hills where a group of friends uncover the bloody legacy of Stone. 


The game seems to be perfectly positioned to take advantage of Supermassive's greatest skills. Its narrative-based, choice-centered structure is something the studio has had plenty of experience with. With franchises like The Dark Pictures Anthology under its belt, the studio's also no stranger to the horror genre. 




This time around, the terror centers around the depths of a steel mill in Oregon where the sadistic actions of a serial killer spawn horrors beyond comprehension. If you're looking for something to raise the hairs on your neck, this seems like a title worth checking out. 


The Casting of Frank Stone launches in 2024 on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S. 

The post Horror game The Casting of Frank Stone unveiled appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Horror game The Casting of Frank Stone unveiled

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
During The Game Awards, Sega dropped a lucid hallucination of a trailer briefly highlighting five games allegedly in development. This includes a new Jet Set Radio, Shinobi, Golden Axe, Streets of Rage, and Crazy Taxi. The also tease a “and more.”


The games go by in a flash. We see a Jet Set Radio that looks pretty on point with colorful graphics and familiar city environments. Then there’s a full 3D Streets of Rage. Afterward, we see a stylish 2D Shinobi. Next is a 3D Golden Axe without a sexy panther man or centaur in sight. Finally, we get to Crazy Taxi, which seemingly highlights multiplayer.




As excited as I am for some of these announcements, a few of them look kind of off. Specifically Streets of Rage and Crazy Taxi. What makes me worry is that Sega has previously cited a “Fortnite-style” service model, specifically referring to Crazy Taxi and Jet Set Radio. Live service model, friends. Hopefully, they’ve changed their ways and we can eventually be legitimately excited to see these games return.


None of the games have a release date, but Sega says they’ll share more soon.

The post Sega throws in the kitchen sink with five game announcements appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Sega throws in the kitchen sink with five game announcements

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Hideo Kojima made an appearance at The Game Awards 2023 to show off a trailer for OD, his next project. Maybe? I’m really not sure what to make of this trailer.


Hungry purple dinosaur? There are people talking to a camera and getting scared. It’s being made with Xbox Game Studios.




Okay, he then explains things. It’s groundbreaking and challenging. Uses cloud gaming technology. Immersive and something no one has seen before. It is a game, but also a movie, and also a new form of media. Jordan Peele is here. Maybe he’ll clear up what OD is. Nope, he’s just talking about how great Hideo Kojima is.


Okay, there you have it, everyone! Lots to look forward to. It’s shaping up great. Wow.


OD is maybe coming out eventually, probably for Xbox and PC.

The post Hideo Kojima reveals OD and what is even happening? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Hideo Kojima reveals OD and what is even happening?

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
There have been some cool things revealed at the 2023 Game Awards. As you might have seen, I've written about some of them. But I'm here to tell you all that a new game in the Mana series has been revealed, and it practically made me jump out of my chair.


Visions of Mana is a brand new entry in the Mana series, which to this point has mostly survived off remakes and a failed gacha game. This new game, from the little we've seen so far, looks like everything I'd want in a new Mana game. There's some flashy Action-RPG combat, a world full of whimsy and magic, and what looks like a variety of spells courtesy of some familiars. It's all huge Secret of Mana vibes and I am here for it.




While the Mana series has struggled in the past, I can't help but have high hopes for this one. Some may remember that Secret of Mana was one of my picks for the best SNES games ever, and I'd love to see this series get a modern twist on that classic charm I loved so much in my younger years. Anything can happen, of course. We only have a small trailer to analyze, after all. But my fingers are very crossed for this one.


Visions of Mana will release in 2024. Stay tuned as we learn more about Visions of Mana.

The post Square Enix’s Mana series returns with Visions of Mana in 2024 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Square Enix’s Mana series returns with Visions of Mana in 2024

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
The next Team Ninja game has locked in a fairly competitive release date. Its next action game Rise of the Ronin arrives on March 22, 2024.


The new game certainly looks up Team Ninja's alley, with plenty of fast combat, slicing, and dicing. It's been known for a while, but now, we finally know when the game arrives.


At tonight's The Game Awards 2023, we got a new trailer looking at the title. Set during a time where the country is divided, it follows one ronin who could have a hand in shaping Japan's future.




Coming off the fairly well-received Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty, Rise of the Ronin does look like Team Ninja trying to keep the string of excellent action games going. But it's headed into a crowded 2024, with one particular competitor that it now shares a release date with: Dragon's Dogma 2.


Whether you going for one, the other, or both, it does look like we won't be hurting for action RPGs in the new year. Rise of the Ronin arrives for PlayStation 5 on March 22, 2024.

The post Team Ninja’s Rise of the Ronin arrives next March appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Team Ninja’s Rise of the Ronin arrives next March

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Bandai Namco Entertainment and Spike Chunsoft revealed the new chapter in the Dragon Ball Z universe as Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero. It may sound like a new energy drink but nope, it's more action fighting in the Budokai Tenkaichi series. Players will be able to learn and master a roster of playable DBZ characters with their own signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. In a cool twist, the arenas will also crumble around you as you fight in them.




I'm admittedly way behind on anything Dragon Ball but this looks like exactly what fans of those games would want, with single-player and online multi-player modes.


No release timeframe was given but Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero will launch on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

The post The next DBZ game is Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The next DBZ game is Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
As nice as the usual salvo of remakes and sequels is, it's nice to see acclaimed developers take on new worlds every now and then. To fill this niche, Moon Studios, the creators of the acclaimed Ori series, has revealed a new ARPG called No Rest for the Wicked.


We can see some vague cinematics at the start, setting the stage for a somber story. However, once the gameplay kicks in, we get a glimpse of an ARPG-style perspective of our protagonist running through some scenery and fighting enemies. It's hard to get a feel for the combat here, but it sure looks cool. The variety of weapon types shown makes me think that players will have a few different playstyles to choose from here.




In a press release received after the show, we got to learn a few more details about No Rest for the Wick…
articles.title: Ori creators reveal new Action RPG No Rest for the Wicked

articles.author: Smangaliso Simelane
articles.description:
Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 made an appearance at The Game Awards with a brand new trailer that confirms the game is coming in 2024.


The latest Hellblade 2 trailer comes after an amazing musical appearance from Heilung performing an original song from the upcoming sequel. Ninja Theory was acquired by Microsoft in 2018, so it's no surprise that the studio's upcoming game will only be available on PC and Xbox Series X/S. 




The latest trailer doesn't offer new story information, but it does show us what a visual feast the sequel will be. It also gives us a glimpse of some of the combat which appears to be much more impactful and bloodier than its predecessor.


The game continues the tale of Senua, a warrior who travels through Helhein to recover the soul of her lover. Her journey is far from straightforward, as she must deal with the Furies in her head that can both help and harm her. The game was lauded for its unique gameplay elements and its well-researched depiction of Psychosis. 


If you're interested in jumping into Ninja Theory's latest offering, you'll be able to pick it up day one on Game Pass. 

The post Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 receives stunning new trailer appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 receives stunning new trailer

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
The Game Awards was full of announcements big and small, so if you're having trouble keeping track of them all, we've gathered up all of our stories here in one place. You can also check out the full list of award winners here. Let us know which announcement excited you most in the comments!
